4307620.name: Journey Back to DreamSpace
4307620.description:
Welcome to Port Hope, an industrious port city where multiple corporations and gangs are all vying for dominance. You play as Jo, a retired jack-of-all-trades with sticky fingers. After being rudely awakened by Ronnie, leader of the Red Tigers, Jo is forced to play their games. Will her adventures warm her cold stoney heart? Or will she stay cynical and withdrawn? Help Jo find a way back to DreamSpace!

Summary

Journey Back to DreamSpace is a quirky 2.5D, top-down, cyberpunk, adventure game. Jo relies on stealth mechanics, hacking and clever use of traps and cybernetic implants to help her survive Port Hope.

Key Features

  • 10 different implants to pick and choose from.

  • 3 semi-open world levels to explore (rundown Silver Bay, Ash Bridge station and the Warehouse District).

  • A main story line along with many side-missions!

  • 4 different types of traps to confuse and trip up enemies, or use them to make a quick get away!

No generative AI was used in the making of this game. All art was drawn by me in GIMP, all 3D assets were made by me in Blender and all audio effects were created/edited by me in Audacity.
4307620.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
